PERSONAL DETAILS
Location:		UAE – Dubai
QUALIFICATIONS

Executive one-year Program to focus on leadership and soft skills to motivate, empower and inspire teams
University at Buffalo. Buffalo, New York, USA - Engineering Management. 2007
Completed a program to focus on the principles of Engineering Management
University at Buffalo. Buffalo, New York, USA - Engineering Career Institute, 2006
Completed seminars focused on enhancing industrial skills including value engineering, leadership, engineering management, market analysis and interpersonal communication skills
CAREER SUMMARY
2013 to date Arkema
January 2022 to date Arkema Coating Solutions: Area Manager Middle East & Africa (MEA).
May 2014 to January 2022 Arkema Coating Resins (ACR), Area Manager MEA.
January 2015 to January 2019 ACR, Global Business Development Manager for global key account.
February 2013 to May 2014ACR, Technical Sales Manager
Lead all aspect of sales, marketing, and technical services for Arkema Coating Solutions in MEA directing 5 Business Units of Arkema that provide innovative solutions in several industries including: Paints & Coatings, Construction Chemicals, Plastics, Textile & Leather, Inks, Home & Personal Care and Water Treatments industries.
Immediate impact and successfully re-established Arkema Coating business in the Middle East region exceeding the annual sales budget by an average of 10% for the past 8 years.
Expanded the sourcing activity into the Middle East from Arkema Europe facilities to also include Arkema India, Malaysia and China facilities with the sourcing choice determined by value for the Business Unit. This strategic approach has provided the business with flexibility towards currency fluctuation into USD market, products availability, and increased products portfolio.
Formulate short / long-term business plans and strategies for every Arkema Business Unit to ensure business growth and expansion in the MEA. Identify opportunities and partners for merge and acquisition. Involved in several M&A projects.
Define opportunities and support Arkema R&D to customize products that suit Middle East local requirements.
Directed Arkema to a leading position in the industrial coating market in Middle East. Successfully penetrated the vehicle refinishing market and regained position with global accounts in the protective coating sector.
Focus on direct business; developed over 200 new customer accounts. The direct business approach has enriched the relationship with the customers, enhanced efficiency, improved profitability, and gained new businesses.
Initiated Arkema logistic hubs project in MEA. Setting up a warehouse for Arkema in Dubai to support MEA customers with the speciality business, enhance services and thus improve profitability.
Restructured agency and distribution channels in MEA.
Feb 2008 to Feb 2013 THE SYRAMER CHEMICAL COMPANY
January 2009- February 2013 Business Director.
February 2008- January 2009 Operations Manager, Business Start-Up.
Established SYRAMER in 2008 as speciality chemicals provider; launched its business growth and development to achieve a leading market position in the polyurethane industry in the Middle. Scope of responsibility included all core executive leadership, operating management, research and development, procurement management, sales and marketing.
Responsible for in-house manufacturing technologies development, from product formulation to process engineering. Assisted in the development of different types of rigid and semi rigid polyurethane foams for many applications.
Developed business plans and provided strategic decisions. Pursued backward integration and successfully oversaw the establishment of polyester polyol production from recycled PET bottles. This had improved the profi

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
